Put Dune: Part One (2021) Original Motion Picture Soundtrack here.

Purchase as MP3 from e.g.:
https://www.amazon.com/music/player/albums/B09F1Y3NCK/
https://www.amazon.de/music/player/albums/B09F2HWHGJ

Make sure, file-names are exactly as listed below.
Note: Amazon files have a space at the end of the filenames. Remove it.

List of files:

01 - Dream of Arrakis.mp3
02 - Herald of the Change.mp3
03 - Bene Gesserit.mp3
04 - Gom Jabbar.mp3
05 - The One.mp3
06 - Leaving Caladan.mp3
07 - Arrakeen.mp3
08 - Ripples in the Sand.mp3
09 - Visions of Chani.mp3
10 - Night on Arrakis.mp3
11 - Armada.mp3
12 - Burning Palms.mp3
13 - Stranded.mp3
14 - Blood for Blood.mp3
15 - The Fall.mp3
16 - Holy War.mp3
17 - Sanctuary.mp3
18 - Premonition.mp3
19 - Ornithopter.mp3
20 - Sandstorm.mp3
21 - Stillsuits.mp3
22 - My Road Leads into the Desert.mp3
